title: client finished patching now i need to repatch
body: this first happened in patch 7.14 I downloaded the patch and I played one match then I logged out for a few hours came backc and it said I had to repatch and when I tried to repatch it would keep starting the download over and over eventually it randomly fixed itself  now its doing it again with patch 7.15 I  finished downloading it then it was like I need to repatch so once again I'm repatching it it keeps starting over

replies.body: It sounds like a connection issue might be getting in your way by failing to grab those updates.  If your network is struggling to communicate with the patching server, it may backtrack or fail completely.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and repair any instability getting in the way.  Let me know if you have any questions!
